text: A World Apart is a 1988 British Zimbabwean drama movie directed by first time director Chris Menges and starring Jodhi May, Barbara Hershey, David Suchet, Jeroen Krabb√©, Linda Mvusi, Tim Roth, Adrian Dunbar, Sally Farmiloe, Yvonne Bryceland, Kate Fitzpatrick. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1988 drama movies Category:British drama movies Category:Zimbabwean movies Category:Movies about Apartheid Category:Movies set in the 1960s Category:Movies set in South Africa Category:Movies composed by Hans Zimmer
title: A World Apart (movie)
